html: (2 Nephi 15:13)."Their honourable men are fam-ished … their multitude dried up with thirst." The leaders ("honourable men") and the masses ("multitude") are without spiritual food or water. We recall the words of Jesus during His mortal ministry: "I am the bread of life: he that cometh to me shall never hunger; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst." (John 6:35; see also John 4:14.)
